description: This table stores the information about the coding validation checks.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the coding validation check. Multiple coding validation checks can occur on one hospital account, so each check has a unique line number.

columns.name: COD_VAL_ALT_ITEM_YN
columns.description:
This item stores the fact that the validation check has been run on the alternate code set items on the diagnosis and procedure tabs on the Coding screen.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: COD_CHK_RULE_ID
columns.description: This item tracks which coding validation rules the account failed.

columns.name: COD_CHK_CER_RULE_ID
columns.description: Stores the coding validation check's general filter rule ID.

columns.name: COD_CHK_BWR_RULE_ID
columns.description: Stores the coding validation check's billing filter rule ID.

columns.name: COD_CHK_BWR_RULE_ID_RULE_NAME
columns.description: This column stores the name of the hospital billing workqueue rule.
